title: Bloomberg Markets: Former 49er Jones on ETF for Sports Fans
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Former 49er Jones on ETF for Sports Fans
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Brent Jones\u0010Super Bowl Winning Tight End with San Francisco 49ers \u0010Advisory Board Member with SportsETFs\u0010Discussing exchange traded fund FANZ, a fund that allows everyday sports fans to invest in sports leagues, via the public partners of those leagues.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
